name: Slime
description:
You like a Slime and you want create some Slimes you can do !!

You can easily work with the Lora Weight.

Examples in images:

Model :

  1. Babes Experimental 7, Weight : 0.7 - First IMG

  2. Elldreth's Vivid Mix, Weight : 0.8 - Second IMG

  3. Dream Sharper, Weight : 0.9 - Third IMG

The rest of images was an example of colorful colors

It is the first Lora that I shared. If you find a problem with it, please leave me a message and I will try to fix the problem in a new version. Thanks!

modelVersions.name: V1.0
modelVersions.description: Update : Wanted to remove the 0 because CIVI doing me an V10 and not an V01 but CIVI didn't understand so...
